title: Bug 124777: Setting a blank tooltip in chart title causes exception when previewing
description: When a blank tooltip is set in the chart title and the chart is previewed, it causes an exception.
OB: When a blank tooltip is set in the chart title and the chart is previewed, an exception is thrown.
EB: When a blank tooltip is set in the chart title and the chart is previewed, it causes an exception to be thrown.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new simple chart.
2. Add title interactivity by enabling the 'Mouse Over/Show Tooltip' option.
3. Leave the tooltip text blank and click the 'Add' button.
